item.title: 8 Million Americans on Minimum Wage Just Got a Raise, but Economists Have a Warning for Consumers
item.description: Experts have debated the merits of minimum wage increases for decades.

item.title: OpenAI May Want Users to Start Interacting With AI in a Different Way
item.description: Can OpenAI get the public to change their ways when it comes to using ChatGPT?

item.title: Why 2026 Will Be the Year Companies Finally Start to Take Worker Well-Being Seriously
item.description: This isn’t wishful thinking. It’s grounded in hard, bottom-line realities.

item.title: 2026’s Biggest Marketing Trend Is Already Dominating the College Bowl Games
item.description: This bowl season, consumer brands have embraced overt-the-top fun, turning games into carnivals of grocery store staples.

item.title: This Automaker Just Overtook Tesla as the Top EV Seller in 2025
item.description: Tesla deliveries fell by nearly 9 percent last year, amid declining EV sales in the U.S.
